item.title: What's next for the ICO? Reflections on Securities Law and the Future of Initial Coin Offerings | Crowdfund Insider
item.description:
What's next for the ICO? Reflections on Securities Law and the Future of Initial Coin Offerings | Crowdfund Insider

To date, fundraising has been blockchain's killer app. In 2017, Initial Coin Offering (ICO) fundraising eclipsed that of traditional venture capital, and in 2018, ICOs have already raised nearly $3 billion in non-dilutive funding. This new form of early-stage financing is incredibly promising, at least in
